thread.title: At long last, U.S. Senate debates 'Dreamer' immigrants' future

title: At long last, U.S. Senate debates 'Dreamer' immigrants' future
text:
At long last, U.S. Senate debates 'Dreamer' immigrants' future   01:21 
The U.S. Senate began a major, free-for-all immigration debate, its first in nearly five years, on Monday evening that could decide the fate of at least 700,000 ''Dreamer'' immigrants, young people brought into the country illegally years ago as children. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
The U.S. Senate began a major, free-for-all immigration debate, its first in nearly five years, on Monday evening that could decide the fate of at least 700,000 "Dreamer" immigrants, young people brought into the country illegally years ago as children. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2EEyrsm
